title: Mastering Biochemical Metabolic Pathways: Self-Directed Mobile Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge in biochemistry and molecular biology
context.additional_context: Weekend/evening learning available for working professionals, smartphone-centric limited technological environment

learning_goals: Learners can explain enzymes and regulatory mechanisms of major metabolic pathways (glycolysis, TCA cycle, gluconeogenesis) with 85% accuracy
Learners can complete case analysis projects utilizing key molecules of metabolic pathways within four weeks
Learners can perform self-directed review activities at least three times a week in a mobile environment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
